# Replit Secrets Configuration
# Add these secrets in the Replit Secrets panel (Tools > Secrets)

# REQUIRED: OpenAI API key for meal plan generation
# Get your key at: https://platform.openai.com/api-keys
OPENAI_API_KEY=sk-your-openai-api-key-here

# OPTIONAL: JWT secret for token signing (auto-generated if not set)
JWT_SECRET=your-random-secret-key-here

# Already configured in Replit
SESSION_SECRET=your-session-secret
